source:
---
title: Dataset 18 - Coordinate systems
format:
  html:
    toc: true
    number-sections: true
engine: julia
execute:
  freeze: auto
  cache: true

#| echo: false
#| output: false
using UFF

data.text/plain:
Universal Dataset Number: 18

  [1mName: Coordinate Systems[22m

  [36m        Record 1: FORMAT(5I10)[39m
  [36m             Field 1       -- coordinate system number[39m
  [36m             Field 2       -- coordinate system type[39m
  [36m             Field 3       -- reference coordinate system number[39m
  [36m             Field 4       -- color[39m
  [36m             Field 5       -- method of definition[39m
  [36m                           = 1 - origin, +x axis, +xz plane[39m
  
  [36m        Record 2: FORMAT(20A2)[39m
  [36m             Field 1       -- coordinate system name[39m
  
  [36m        Record 3: FORMAT(1P6E13.5)[39m
  [36m             Total of 9 coordinate system definition parameters.[39m
  [36m             Fields 1-3    -- origin of new system specified in[39m
  [36m                              reference system[39m
  [36m             Fields 4-6    -- point on +x axis of the new system[39m
  [36m                              specified in reference system[39m
  [36m             Fields 7-9    -- point on +xz plane of the new system[39m
  [36m                              specified in reference system[39m

  Records 1 thru 3 are repeated for each coordinate system in the model.
data.text/markdown:
Universal Dataset Number: 18

**Name:   Coordinate Systems**

```julia
        Record 1: FORMAT(5I10)
             Field 1       -- coordinate system number
             Field 2       -- coordinate system type
             Field 3       -- reference coordinate system number
             Field 4       -- color
             Field 5       -- method of definition
                           = 1 - origin, +x axis, +xz plane

        Record 2: FORMAT(20A2)
             Field 1       -- coordinate system name

        Record 3: FORMAT(1P6E13.5)
             Total of 9 coordinate system definition parameters.
             Fields 1-3    -- origin of new system specified in
                              reference system
             Fields 4-6    -- point on +x axis of the new system
                              specified in reference system
             Fields 7-9    -- point on +xz plane of the new system
                              specified in reference system
```

Records 1 thru 3 are repeated for each coordinate system in the model.

Universal Dataset Number: 18

\textbf{Name:   Coordinate Systems}

\begin{verbatim}
        Record 1: FORMAT(5I10)
             Field 1       -- coordinate system number
             Field 2       -- coordinate system type
             Field 3       -- reference coordinate system number
             Field 4       -- color
             Field 5       -- method of definition
                           = 1 - origin, +x axis, +xz plane

        Record 2: FORMAT(20A2)
             Field 1       -- coordinate system name

        Record 3: FORMAT(1P6E13.5)
             Total of 9 coordinate system definition parameters.
             Fields 1-3    -- origin of new system specified in
                              reference system
             Fields 4-6    -- point on +x axis of the new system
                              specified in reference system
             Fields 7-9    -- point on +xz plane of the new system
                              specified in reference system

Records 1 thru 3 are repeated for each coordinate system in the model.

data.text/markdown:
```julia
Dataset18
```

A struct containing UFF Dataset 18 metadata.

**Fields**

  * `type::Symbol`: Data set type
  * `cs_num::Int`: Coordinate system number
  * `cs_type::Int`: Coordinate system type
  * `ref_cs_num::Int`: Reference coordinate system number
  * `color::Int`: Color
  * `method_def::Int`: Method of definition
  * `cs_name::String`: Coordinate system name
  * `cs_origin::Vector{Float64}`: Origin of new system specified in reference system
  * `cs_x::Vector{Float64}`: Point on +x axis of the new system specified in reference system
  * `cs_xz::Vector{Float64}`: Point on +xz plane of the new system specified in reference system
data.text/html:
Dataset18

A struct containing UFF Dataset 18 metadata.

Fields

  • type::Symbol: Data set type

  • cs_num::Int: Coordinate system number

  • cs_type::Int: Coordinate system type

  • ref_cs_num::Int: Reference coordinate system number

  • color::Int: Color

  • method_def::Int: Method of definition

  • cs_name::String: Coordinate system name

  • cs_origin::Vector{Float64}: Origin of new system specified in reference system

  • cs_x::Vector{Float64}: Point on +x axis of the new system specified in reference system

  • cs_xz::Vector{Float64}: Point on +xz plane of the new system specified in reference system
data.text/latex:
\begin{verbatim}
Dataset18
\end{verbatim}
A struct containing UFF Dataset 18 metadata.

\textbf{Fields}

\begin{itemize}
\item \texttt{type::Symbol}: Data set type


\item \texttt{cs\_num::Int}: Coordinate system number


\item \texttt{cs\_type::Int}: Coordinate system type


\item \texttt{ref\_cs\_num::Int}: Reference coordinate system number


\item \texttt{color::Int}: Color


\item \texttt{method\_def::Int}: Method of definition


\item \texttt{cs\_name::String}: Coordinate system name


\item \texttt{cs\_origin::Vector\{Float64\}}: Origin of new system specified in reference system


\item \texttt{cs\_x::Vector\{Float64\}}: Point on +x axis of the new system specified in reference system


\item \texttt{cs\_xz::Vector\{Float64\}}: Point on +xz plane of the new system specified in reference system

\end{itemize}
